statements.statement: select * from sys_tenant where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( name like '%${key}%' or value like '%${key}%' or code like '%${key}%' or remark like '%${key}%' or enable like '%${key}%' ) <#if query.ids??> and id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) <#if query.id??> and id = ${query.id} <#if query.name??> and name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.name)}' <#if query.value??> and value = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.value)}' <#if query.code??> and code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.code)}' <#if query.sn??> and sn = ${query.sn} <#if query.remark??> and remark = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.remark)}' <#if query.enable??> and enable = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.enable)}' <#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' ======= <#-- -------------------关键字查询开始 --------------- --> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( name like '%${key}%' or value like '%${key}%' or code like '%${key}%' or remark like '%${key}%' or enable like '%${key}%' ) <#-- -------------------关键字查询结束 --------------- --> <#-- -------------------综合查询开始 --------------- --> <#if query.ids??> and id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) <#if query.id??> and id = ${query.id} <#if query.name??> and name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.name)}' <#if query.value??> and value = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.value)}' <#if query.code??> and code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.code)}' <#if query.sn??> and sn = ${query.sn} <#if query.remark??> and remark = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.remark)}' <#if query.enable??> and enable = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.enable)}' <#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' <#-- -------------------综合查询结束 --------------- --> >>>>>>> branch 'master' of https://github.com/mmyuan1020/example.git
